data.title: Official benchmark integration and runs: LongMemEval, MemoryArena, MemoryAgentBench

data.body: Implemented official-mode runners/orchestrator/scoreboard and generated artifacts: results/official-longmemeval-1772148096443.json, results/official-memoryarena-1772148138212.json, results/official-memoryagentbench-1772148094598.json, results/official-benchmarks-manifest-1772148138220.json, docs/research/official-benchmark-scoreboard.md; findings note added in docs/research/findings.md (CTX-33 section + appendix updates).

Reviewed plan vs implementation. Acceptance criteria check: (1) Three official-mode result JSON artifacts present under results/ plus manifest (pass). (2) Unified official scoreboard present at docs/research/official-benchmark-scoreboard.md (pass). (3) Each benchmark entry includes scope/score/latency/cost in scoreboard and findings table (pass). (4) Fully-official blocked step explicitly called out: missing external LLM-judge credentials, deterministic fallback labeled in outputs (pass). No functional regressions observed from docs-only follow-up edits.
